mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO pay_trans_mode (ptm_transModeCode,ptm_transModeName,ptm_state,ptm_remark,ptm_createTime,ptm_updateTime) SELECT * FROM (
SELECT #{transModeCode} as ptm_transModeCode, #{transModeName} as ptm_transModeName, #{state} as ptm_state, #{remark} as ptm_remark, #{createTime} as ptm_createTime, #{updateTime} as ptm_updateTime FROM DUAL
) A
mapper.update:
UPDATE pay_trans_mode
ptm_transModeId = #{transModeId},
ptm_transModeCode=#{transModeCode},
ptm_transModeName=#{transModeName},
ptm_state=#{state},
ptm_remark=#{remark},
ptm_createTime=#{createTime},
ptm_updateTime=#{updateTime}
WHERE ptm_transModeId = #{transModeId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM pay_trans_mode WHERE ptm_transModeId IN
#{transModeId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from pay_trans_mode where ptm_transModeId = #{transModeId}
